presentationColumns.name: Accounted Debit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the accounted debit amount for the transactions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Costing - Cost Accounting.Accounted Debit Amount

presentationColumns.name: Accounted  Credit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the accounted credit amount for the transactions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Costing - Cost Accounting.Accounted  Credit Amount

presentationColumns.name: Accounted Net Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the activity amount of the transactions. Where activity amount = Sum of accounted debit amount - Sum of accounted credit amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Costing - Cost Accounting.Accounted Net Amount
